head.supplied: 17/12/85. ¶ ¶ Herewith, dear Mr Thomas, I send the letter from H. Exc. the Governor of Gambia, ¶ so that the hon. the Premier may become aware of his Excellency's grateful acknowledgement of the pre...

div.p: P85/3818, unit 87, VPRS 1163/P1 inward correspondence files, VA 672 Premier's Office, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Herewith, dear Mr Thomas, I send the letter from H. Exc. the Governor of Gambia,
See E. Thomas to M, 16 December 1885. so that the hon. the Premier may become aware of his Excellency's grateful acknowledgement of the presentation of the Eucalyptography and the supply of Eucalyptus-seeds.
MS annotation, dated 19 December 1886, in an unknown hand 'Thank for sending lr [letter] (wh return) & say that another lr of acknt was sent to the Premier direct'. See E. Thomas to M, 23 December 1885. See also, in the same file, A. Moloney to J. Service, 30 September 1885.
